mean_en: forming business connections and contacts through informal social meetings; computing the interconnection of two or more networks in different places meetings.
sentence: Having skills in networking will help you find jobs or clients.
sentence_trans: 拥有建立人际网的技巧可以帮助你找到工作或是寻找客户。
word_etyma: net网+work 操作+ing → networking人际网
